name: 我们的房屋 OUR HOUSE Demo
detailed_description:
desperate survival mode


Players and Characters

You can control any soldier individually, synchronize all the soldiers, order the platoon, you can also use five roles in the defense tower, and use vehicles to guard the stronghold.

Victory conditions

By dispatching soldiers, all the strongholds were occupied.

Battlefield

The integration of forests and the two sides of the Taiwan Strait.

Classical Defensive Combat Mode


Players and Characters

Players can control five roles in the same battlefield. Initially in our house, Leader uses pistols, Shock uses rifles,Brave uses submachine guns, Blaster uses shotguns, and Aim uses sniper guns. You can assign the positions of each role. When the enemy attacked, you can switch roles, shoot at each corner. Colour can use grenades, close weapon daggers, as the battle escalates, you can choose five roles freely, with your favorite weapon combination, occupy a good shooting position, to attack the enemy.OUR HOUSE, we have radars, we can locate the enemy before it enters the field of vision, and we can use radio-controlled UAVs to shoot bomber guns or tanks to shoot bomber guns.

Victory conditions

In OUR HOUSE, use all available weapons in the battlefield to survive and destroy all enemies. The enemy's goal is to destroy your defense barrier. You must destroy the enemy in front of you as soon as possible to protect the defense barrier.

Battlefield

In OUR HOUSE, you can fight in closed huts, in tight trenches, in ruins, in the basement of a magnificent military base, in the underground city, in the dense jungle, in the mysterious sea floor, and in the vast sky.

More information


Enemy

In OUR HOUSE, the enemy's army can be a shoulder-to-shoulder soldier, a steel monster tank, an air Iron Eagle aircraft, a naval fortress, a whale submarine, or a missile into the earth.

Weapons


Firearms

In OUR HOUSE, there are many weapons. Players can choose pistols with fast firing speed and small recoil, powerful automatic rifles, shotguns with large firing range, accurate sniper guns, machine guns with many bullets, and submachine guns with fast changing speed.

Artillery

In OUR HOUSE, there are many kinds of artillery weapons. Players can use penetrating rockets, long-range anti-aircraft guns, howitzers that easily bypass obstacles.

Driver

In OUR HOUSE, there are vehicles for driving: tanks, unmanned aerial vehicle, ships, warships, submarines, missiles; and fixed tools: machine guns, mortars, turrets,Air Defense Gun, bow and arrow towers.

short_description: OUR HOUSE, facing huge numbers of soldiers. In theory, there is no winning battle, but there are countless battles in which there are too few to win. It's not about strength, it's about how to use it and how to distribute it. In OUR HOUSE, weapons will be used to the utmost.
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win7 64 bits
  • Processor: i3 650
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX660
  • Storage: 450 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win10 64 bits
  • Processor: i5 4690
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX1060
  • Storage: 450 MB available space
